mapper.delete: delete from sb_cart where uid=#{uid} AND pid=#{pid}
mapper.update: UPDATE sb_cart SET num=#{num}, modified_time=#{modifiedtime} WHERE cid=#{cid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sb_cart WHERE uid=#{uid} AND pid=#{pid}
SELECT cid, uid, pid, sb_cart.num, sb_cart.price, NAME, IMAGE FROM sb_cart LEFT JOIN sb_goods ON sb_cart.pid=sb_goods.ITEMID WHERE uid=#{uid} ORDER BY sb_cart.created_time DESC
